text: Kya tumne us shaks ke haal par gaur nahin kiya jisne Ibrahim se jhagda kiya tha? Jhagda is baat par ke Ibrahim ka Rubb kaun hai, aur is bina par ke us shaks ko Allah ne hukumat de rakkhi thi. Jab Ibrahim ne kaha ke “mera Rubb woh hai, jiske ikhtiyar mein zindagi aur maut hai, to usne jawab diya : “zindagi aur maut mere ikhtiyar mein hai” Ibrahim ne kaha: “ accha, Allah Suraj ko mashirq se nikalta hai, tu zara usey magrib se nikaal la”. Yeh sunkar woh munkir e haqq shashtar (astonish) reh gaya, magar Allah zalimon ko raah e raast nahin dikhaya karta
